issues.description: The UML diagram in the problem statement specifies getTotalNumberOfStudents() with a return type of String, but the solution implementation (and the intended behavior) returns an int. This mismatch will confuse students when implementing the method and when writing tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the UML diagram (and any related description) so that getTotalNumberOfStudents() is declared to return int instead of String, aligning it with the intended implementation.
